name: Fellogic, Inc.
description: Fellogic, Inc. is a technology-driven logistics company specializing in supply chain management and warehousing solutions. Established in 2015, Fellogic aims to revolutionize the logistics industry by providing innovative software and automated systems that optimize inventory management and improve operational efficiency. The company offers a suite of services including transportation management, order fulfillment, and real-time tracking, catering to businesses of all sizes across various sectors. With a focus on sustainability, Fellogic employs green logistics practices, utilizing energy-efficient transportation options and eco-friendly packaging solutions. The company leverages advanced technologies such as artificial intelligence and machine learning to enhance its logistics processes, allowing clients to gain insights into their supply chains and make data-driven decisions. Fellogic is committed to delivering exceptional customer service, ensuring that clients receive tailored solutions that meet their specific needs. As the demand for efficient logistics solutions continues to grow, Fellogic is well-positioned to lead the industry with its innovative approach and technology integrations.

seo.meta_title: Fellogic, Inc. | Innovative Logistics and Supply Chain Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Fellogic, Inc., a leader in logistics technology providing efficient supply chain management solutions for businesses. Discover our innovative services and commitment to sustainability.

faq.question: What services does Fellogic offer?
faq.answer: Fellogic offers logistics solutions including transportation management, order fulfillment, and warehouse management.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Fellogic?
faq.answer: Jessica Taylor is the CEO of Fellogic, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Fellogic headquartered?
faq.answer: Fellogic is headquartered in Chicago, Illinois, USA.
